ISSUE.TITLE: Webhook targets are active, even if they are deactivated
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Bug Everything is in the title :) ### Dolibarr Version 19.0.2 ### Environment PHP PHP8.2 ### Environment Database MariaDB ### Steps to reproduce the behavior and expected behavior Create a target Activate it Webhook works Deactivate the target Webhook still works ### Attached files _No response_

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix #29797 add test on Target status
